name: Imperial Flight
description:
The Ultimate Strategy Game

My submission to the Kenney 2022 Game Jam - "Growth"  

Inspired by Advanced Wars and Wargroove, Imperial Flight is a local multiplayer turn-based strategy game where the goal is to capture as much territory as possible rather than to annihilate your opponent. Move your planes over a target to capture it and the nearby area. Flags only capture a small area, whereas houses capture the largest. From a tent, you can build new planes using the money gained per turn. There are three classes of plane from large to small. Smaller planes have less health and attack than larger ones, however they can move further. You can attack another plane by moving yours next to it, and then selecting that other plane.

A number of features had to be cut in order to make the deadline, such as enemy AI, music, and the ability for smaller planes to place down flags. Apologies.

CONTROLS:
  • W A S D - Movement in the menu / game
  • SPACE - Selection in the menu / game
  • BACKSPACE - Deselect a unit / building
  • RETURN or ESCAPE - End turn
